#summary How to generate and view documentation of the sourcecode
#labels Phase-Implementation

== Generation ==

Go into the main directory of Schoorbs and type(on linux) {{{ ./schoorbs-contrib/makedoc.php }}}
The generated Documentation is now available in the schoorbs-doc/ directory

== For Developers ==

If you make new code, be check that it ends in .php and the directory is in the array $aDirs  at the top of the schoorbs-contrib/makedoc.php script.
